sourcesContent:
const Instruction = () => { return (
Instruction
  • Choose a Surah you wish to memorize.
  • Begin with 3 to 5 verses at a time.
  • Repeat each verse 3 times, and the entire set of verses 5 times.
  • Listen to the audio for the first two repetitions, and on the third, recite along with the audio.
  • Use Spaced repetition learning technique.{" "} Learn more
  • Continue repeating until you can recite the verses from memory.
); }; export default Instruction;
